action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application appearance and landing page settings.
notes: Focus on setting the landing page to the calendar or inbox to save clicks.

action_item: Users & Roles - Upgrade patient search functionality by unchecking the legacy search box.
notes: This allows for more precise searches using multiple parameters.

action_item: Security - Change main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the straightforward process to ensure security.

action_item: Security - Change eSignature ID for document signing.
notes: Requires validation of current ID before setting a new one.

action_item: Security - Update visual signature for documents.
notes: Validation of eSignature ID is required before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates using CCDA format.
notes: Select and order sections of patient charts for clinical summaries.
